promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a chibi cute simple dragon fighting-type holding a white glaive. It can be found in arena-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or fighting. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Glaivera, a chibi cute simple dragon fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in arena-like environments It has the following abilities: mach-punch. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word dragon or fighting or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, dragon-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Glaivera is a vivacious battler that seeks out arenas to practice its agile strikes. Its punch is a force to be reckoned with!
